subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: David Ash threw three touchdown passes to Jaxon Shipley, and Joe Bergeron scored on a 2-yard run with 29 seconds left to lift No. 12 Texas to a 41-36 win against Oklahoma State.
snippet: David Ash threw three touchdown passes to Jaxon Shipley, and Joe Bergeron scored on a 2-yard run with 29 seconds left to lift No. 12 Texas to a 41-36 win against Oklahoma State.
